summary: The test class runner for xUnit.net v3 tests (with overridable context).

content.value: public abstract class XunitTestClassRunnerBase<TContext, TTestClass, TTestMethod, TTestCase> : TestClassRunner<TContext, TTestClass, TTestMethod, TTestCase> where TContext : XunitTestClassRunnerBaseContext<TTestClass, TTestCase> where TTestClass : class, IXunitTestClass where TTestMethod : class, IXunitTestMethod where TTestCase : class, IXunitTestCase
